page.title: 16FASHIONS IN 1985
page.content: Today's{fashions for girls}are mainly skirts but I think trousers will come back in. The{skirts}that are in the fashion now have pleats at the bottom and buttons to pin them together. Quite a few girls wear cotton{trousers with a top which joins on to it. The {top}has no sleeves and the most popu- lar{colours}are pink and turquoise. { Fashions for boys}are 'body-popping' clothes which are{track suits}with hoods on them. They wear{trainers}with long tongues and they also double the laces. The way they do this is to thread the laces once and thread them again over the last thread. They also wear coats which look like{anoraks}but they are not. I like{today's fashions}because they are more bright clothes. About two years ago they used to be browns greys and blacks and they used to look dull.
